metadata.title: CVE-2021-36093 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: It's possible to create an email which can be stuck while being processedby PostMaster filters, causing DoS. This issue affects: OTRS AG ((OTRS))Community Edition 6.0.x version 6.0.1 and later versions. OTRS AG OTRS7.0.x version 7.0.28 and prior versions; 8.0.x version 8.0.15 and priorversions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
